channel.title: StormyNight-Update 2...no hate just tips please
channel.description:
Now i only worked on my server for a week this month, yet made a big break in finding my cache that works from another blank client/source. Now after I got it the updates will be bigger and better then this one... i was still playing around and adding items that my server didn't have like some godswords, dclaws, and many more. I also updated some npc graphics which I now think my server is getting some where. Please leave tips and comments on what you think and would like to see in my next update video. Ps: I made the video commentary because it speeds up the video.
~~~~~Goals~~~~~~ 1. Finish shops 2. Training grounds 3. Get slayer running (would like help on how to do this) 4. work on items price 5. finish "wear" items ( I show you in the video) 6. more to come ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Video [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OCEqE1DUALc&feature=youtube_gdata[/youtube]
Thanks again
